name: CoreFTP Connection Configuration
summary: A COREFTP file is a configuration file created by CoreFTP, a File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) client for Windows. It contains saved connection details such as the server address, username, password (if saved), port number, and protocol type, such as FTP, SFTP, and FTPS. COREFTP files allow users to quickly connect to previously configured servers without re-entering their login information every time.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: COREFTP file open in Microsoft Notepad 11
